ExampleDefinition.Title: Change Render Series Type
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to change the type of a RenderableSeries (e.g. change Line to Column, to Mountain) using the SciChart API
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Change Render Series Type</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates how to change how a series type is rendered in code.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Click on a series to select it. With the series selected, change the Series Type via the dropdown.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Note this example uses the HitTest API with interpolation to allow selecting of a series via mouse-click anywhere on the line, column or area. </Run>
